@Mr_Tagomi ah, I'd say it's in his calendar. Irish American lobby would push it surely

@KCsixtyseven ZZ only just starting. If Real really wanted Klopp they'd have him. He was available as they were looking around

@KCsixtyseven ...he's gonna succeed where the like of Rafa failed.
@KCsixtyseven think many had too high an expectation really. Reckon he's very good on a lot of things ... But not sure he's ...
@KCsixtyseven looking a little distant now? Last two seasons - not good. Great start this season - depth of trust odd to me
"In Klopp I trust" I read people saying. Why though? Not saying he shud go, or that he's bad - but why the unquestioning trust?
@TheFNundy @AnalyseSport Swansea, Wolves and Southampton at Anfirld tho? Ultra competitive?
@scampers2009 better be worth something

For Klopp it's always more about the reaction than the defeat - but worrying we are not getting a reaction now

Deserved nothing there. Well done Wolves.
Wudnt underestimate importance of getting a draw here for our season #lfc
Coutinho taking way too many touches

The windiest thing at Anfield is the Liverpool team I'm afraid
